short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't cha wish your console was hawt like me?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hawtio is a modular web console for managing your Java stuff.

Once installed it can connect to any Java process which has a jolokia agent installed (http://jolokia.org/) and view its JMX MBeans and work with its various services such as Apache Camel, Apache ActiveMQ or fabric8.

hawtio has lots of plugins for working with various Java frameworks and tools: http://hawt.io/plugins/index.html

for more help check out the documentation: http://hawt.io/docs/index.html
